products.name: Copilot

products.description: A low‑code/no‑code platform for organisations to build, test, and publish custom AI agents that integrate into Microsoft 365 and external apps.

products.name: Edge Copilot
products.description: An AI‑powered sidebar in Edge for summarising webpages, answering browsing questions, generating content and voice‑enabled assistance without leaving the page.

products.name: Researcher
products.description: An AI agent that tackles complex, multi‑step research tasks by combining enterprise and web data with deep search capabilities to deliver high‑quality, accurate insights.

products.name: Analyst
products.description: An AI agent that thinks like a data scientist, enabling visualization, analysis, and interpretation of data—such as customer segmentation or revenue projections—directly within Copilot.
